English.Keywords: synchronization, file sharing, project collaboration, version control, revision control, hardware project, CAD files
English.Char_Desc_80: Freeware Windows collaboration tool for engineers, scientist and designers
English.Char_Desc_250: 'Version Control for engineers' (SVN edition) is a freeware Windows collaboration tool for engineers, scientist and designers. Program give you the file revision control for your hardware, engineering and scientific projects.
English.Char_Desc_450: 'Version Control for engineers' (SVN edition) is a freeware Windows collaboration tool for engineers, scientist and designers. 'Version Control for engineers' give you the file revision control for your hardware, engineering and scientific projects. Features: File synchronization via LAN or Internet. Full change control. Whole project history. Merge conflict resolver. Clear Windows GUI and easy installation.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
'Version Control for engineers' (SVN edition) is a freeware Windows collaboration tool for engineers, scientist and designers.
'Version Control for engineers' give you the file revision control for your hardware, engineering and scientific projects.
Features File synchronization via LAN or Internet. Full change control. Whole project history. Merge conflict resolver. Clear Windows GUI and easy installation.
'Version Control for engineers' is graphical user interface for SVN (Apache Subversion) version control system.
Program supports the file, http and https connection to SVN repositories. To collaborate on your project, you need the ready SVN-repository in you LAN, Internet or cloud.
With 'Version Control for engineers' you can handle file versions and revisions for most of desktop CAD/CAM systems.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: Original version of `Version Control for engineers` can be freely distributed over the Internet in an unchanged form
